name: PINKFONG Mother Goose
description: Remember all the delightful songs from your childhood?  Now, have fun with your children with the classic nursery rhymes at PINKFONG Mother Goose. Sing along, read along, play learning games and color all the characters from your favorite songs. Old MacDonald, Humpty Dumpty, Jack and Jill and many more!  FEATURES  1. Sing Along Mother Goose Songs - 20 All-time-favorite kids songs animated with PINKFONGs original characters  - Arranged by educational kids songs experts with bouncy rhythm and catchy melodies  - Eentsy Weentsy Spider, The Wheels on the Bus, Hickory Dickory Dock and more  2. Read & Learn Nursery Rhymes  - Listen to the nursery rhymes slowly and learn the words  - Read along with the highlighting narration  3. Play Learning Games  - Playful activities including puzzles, card matching, running games - Learn numbers, colors, animals, fruits and much more basic words while playing  4. Color Favorite Characters - Various coloring tools and patterns to play creative - Color 20 Mother Goose characters including Humpty Dumpty, Three Little Kittens, and Baa, Baa, Black Sheep   Have an amazing time with [PINKFONG Mother Goose]!
